67327.name: 5.b.1 - Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone - Both sexes or no breakdown by sex
67327.datasetName: Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex
67327.s_name: Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex

source.name: Proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
The proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex is defined as the ‘proportion of 
individuals who own a mobile telephone, by sex’.  
 
Comments and limitations: 
 
While the data on the ‘proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone’ currently only exist for 
very few countries, ITU is encouraging all countries to collect data on this indicator through national 
household surveys and the indicator is expected to be added to the Partnership on Measuring ICT for 
Development’s Core List of Indicators. The number of countries with official data for this indicator is 
expected to increase in the near future. 
 

Data Availability 

 
2013 to 2015 (latest) data are available for 23 countries, including some OECD countries.
